MathMLElementMsub.summary: The <msub> MathML element is used to attach a subscript to an expression.

remarks.para: It uses the following syntax: <msub> base subscript </msub>.

-{{ MathMLElement("msup") }} (Superscript)
-{{ MathMLElement("msubsup") }} (Subscript-superscript pair)
-{{ MathMLElement("mmultiscripts") }} (Prescripts and tensor indices)
